post_text: March 9, 2016 at 10:06â€¯PM#1Dear all,What is the right syntax to use a wildcard in variable ? I'm talking about the variable name and not his value.e.g. I've some uservar $spot1, $spot2, $spot3 etc.... and want to search all my groups with a variable name starting with $spotThis may be something like :search group $spot*but it's not !Thanks for your help.Regards.
title: Wildcard in variable
